author: Press
title: Ed Bernstein Will Interview Cliff Atkinson
text:
(MENAFN Press) (EMAILWIRE.COM, July 09, 2015 ) Las Vegas, NV -- Ed Bernstein will interview Cliff Atkinson, general manager of the Mandarin Oriental in Las Vegas, about running a 1st class, non-gaming hotel in a city known for gambling. 

The Mandarin Oriental was recently picked as the #1 non-gaming hotel in Las Vegas by Travel Leisure Magazine with Vdara, Four Seasons, The Signature at MGM and Delano rounding out the top five. 

Atkinson will be discussing how he runs a first-class hotel, the differences between a gaming and non-gaming hotel, the unique features and design of the Mandarin and the customers he sees at the hotel. 

Tune in this Sunday at 3:00 p.m. to hear what Atkinson has to say about this one-of-a-kind Las Vegas hotel!
